meanings.definition: The quality of being amusing or entertaining.
meanings.sent1: Her joke had a lot of funniness, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's funniness brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The funniness of the situation was evident in the way everyone chuckled.
meanings.sent4: His funniness was like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The funniness of the movie stayed with the audience long after it ended.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being humorous or causing laughter.
meanings.sent1: The funniness of the cartoon made the kids giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent2: His natural funniness made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent3: The funniness of the situation caught everyone off guard, leading to a burst of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her funniness was like a magnet, drawing people towards her with joy.
meanings.sent5: The funniness of his jokes was infectious, spreading laughter all around.
